---
title: "add_header_above"
output: 
  pdf_document:
    keep_tex: true
---

# Plain LaTeX 
```{r}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
dt <- mtcars[1:5, 1:4]

kable(dt, format = "latex") %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "a" = 2, "b" = 2)) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "a" = 3, "b" = 1))
```

# Basic Bootstrap Table
```{r}
kable(dt, format = "latex", booktabs = T) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "a" = 2, "b" = 2)) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "a" = 3, "b" = 1))
```
